snippet: Jamie Vardy’s double at Sunderland sealed a 2-0 victory that guaranteed a coveted top-four finish in the Premier League.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Leicester defeats Sunderland, 2-0, landing Champions League berth for first time; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Jamie Vardy’s double at Sunderland sealed a 2-0 victory that guaranteed a coveted top-four finish in the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Leicester Captures Coveted Berth for First Time
headline.main: Leicester Captures Coveted Berth for First Time
